body.name: CAMBOFOTO 74"-Camera-Tripod, Porfessional Aluminum Heavy Duty Vlog/Video Recording Tripod Stand with Travel Bag for Mirrorless/DSLR/Phone/Camcorder/Spotting Scopes

features: 【𝟳𝟰-𝗜𝗡𝗖𝗛 𝗟𝗜𝗚𝗛𝗧𝗪𝗘𝗜𝗚𝗛𝗧 𝗧𝗥𝗜𝗣𝗢𝗗】🕛This is a lightweight tripod that can be adjusted in height from 20 to 74 inches, suitable for cameras and cell phones. It folds down to just 19 inches for easy portability, making it ideal for frequent changes in shooting locations and travel. Despite its weight of only 2.8 pounds, it can support weights of up to 8.8 pounds.

【𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗧𝗥𝗔𝗩𝗘𝗟 𝗧𝗥𝗜𝗣𝗢𝗗】🕑This tripod is made of durable engineering plastic and lightweight aluminum alloy, offering strength without adding bulk. It remains stable in mild outdoor breezes (up to wind force 3) and has a hook at the base of the center column for adding weights, improving stability even against minor impacts.

【𝟯𝟲𝟬° 𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘 𝗔𝗗𝗝𝗨𝗦𝗧𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧 𝗢𝗙 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗛𝗘𝗔𝗗】🕓The tripod head features horizontal and vertical rotation capabilities (controlled by tightening and loosening the handle), ensuring your camera or smartphone can be freely adjusted within a 360° range to align with your target. The Bubble Level Indicator at the base of the center column position helps you align your camera to the indicated horizontal position.

【𝗦𝗠𝗢𝗢𝗧𝗛 𝗔𝗦 𝗦𝗜𝗟𝗞 𝗥𝗢𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 𝗢𝗙 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗛𝗘𝗔𝗗】🕕This tripod has undergone multiple optimizations and upgrades, with each component meticulously crafted to reduce errors. As a result, the tripod head's joints rotate smoothly like silk, ensuring precise alignment without any focus loss when tracking. Compared to other tripods, its major advantage lies in the absence of any stiffness when adjusting the camera angles.

【𝗠𝗨𝗟𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗨𝗡𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟 𝗧𝗥𝗜𝗣𝗢𝗗】🕖This tripod is versatile, compatible with various devices such as cameras, mirrorless cameras (CSC), ring lights, projectors, and smartphones. It's ideal for capturing photos and videos at events, parties, travel, hiking, sports events, and for shooting YouTube videos, vlogs, live streams, and online meetings. We provide a 2-year warranty, so please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I've bought quite a few "inexpensive" tripods over the years. They were all lightwieght, cheaply-made pieces of junk, and I pretty much expected the same when I ordered this tripod. I was pleasantly surprised to receive a well-made, sturdy tripod! It is an exceptional value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tripod and Monopod all in One - Nice Features
reviews.reviewText: I am always over-packing when I head out and since I don’t usually have enough room to carry both a tripod and a monopod I have to choose just one, usually ending up wishing I had brought the other. Since finding the CAMBOFOTO 70” 2 in 1 Tripod / Monopod I don’t have to make that choice any more.I really was not expecting a lot from this tripod / monopod when I ordered as most multi-function products usually have compromises. However, the CAMBFOTO Tripod / Monopod turned out to be a lot nicer than I expected.Starting with the carrying case, it is your standard tripod case with carrying strap. I do like that the case material is made from a water resistant material, which I assume to be polyester. I like this slick material not for being waterproof but because it is less prone to picking up dirt and is easier to wipe down and keep clean than a canvas case.The tripod itself extends and opens very easily with 3 flip-locks that allow the height adjustment of the 3 4-section legs. The anodized aluminum legs are lightweight, but substantial enough so that collapsing or bending is not an concern. There are rubber cup-like feet on the bottom to help keep the tripod steady and prevents the tripod from marring delicate surfaces such as my wood floors.The upper section of the legs have foam covers on all three sections that make handling the tripod a lot nicer. There is also a built in carrying handle and a level bubble for keeping things… level. In addition, on the bottom post section there is a hook to use for adding more stability by either using a weight bag or a securing strap. This hook also comes in handy for hanging the tripod case.The top tripod post can be safely raised another foot or so and locks in place using a knurled knob. I like that the post has markings showing the highest level that the post should be raised.The tripod head tilts vertically 90 degrees and is locked in place again with a knurled knob. It also rotates freely 360°. The camera mount is your standard quick release plate with 1/4" screw. This plate is on a hinge and can be allowing you to quickly go from a landscape shot to a vertical shot without removing the camera.Note: The tripod head moves freely and can be used with a video camera to capture moving scenes, but I feel this tripod is best used for still photography and video.Finally to the monopod feature. I was getting ready to read the manual to figure how to disassemble the tripod to use it as a monopod when I discovered that with the locking knob loosened the center post simply lifted out of the top of the tripod mount. Sweet!The monopod has 5 sections with 4 legs that can be easily adjusted and locked in place by slightly twisting each section to lock it in place. I find this twist lock method much faster and easier to use than standard flip-locks. The monopod can be adjusted from 20” all the way to 65” making for one long selfie stick!So far I really like this CAMBFOTO Tripod / Monopod and it has become my go-to camera mount when travelling. I have just started using the CAMBFOTO and if I experience any issues I’ll update this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the money but poor tilt locking on the head
reviews.reviewText: Great price for a decent tripod. The tilt on the head can’t be locked sufficiently tight to prevent the head from tilting with a long, heavy lens or a teleprompter holding a tablet. Without a good locking mechanism, it isn’t any good for the purpose I wanted it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Head pans extremely smoothly!
reviews.reviewText: I used the tripod for holding a small spotting scope for birding. My previous tripods were jerky in their movement. This one's smooth as could be. It's very lightweight and very easy to set up which is important spot bird you want to get a quick closer look. Highly recommended for birding. Price point is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my new camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality. Sturdy. Perfect for what I need it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very very good one, never had such a cheap and usable tripod

A la fois léger (1.2kg !) et robuste, il rempli parfaitement son rôle, le tout dans un sac de transport se glissant partout sans encombre (sac de randonnée, voiture, etc...).- Un double système de blocage de l'inclinaison (vertical, petite molette et horizontal visser la poignée).- Une manivelle est présente pour déplier/replier l'axe central avec une vis de blocage.- Une solide poignée de transportUne fois le trépied complètement déplié, le crochet prend tout son sens et permet de stabiliser l'appareil en accrochant un poids et ainsi le renforcer.Vraiment pas déçu de cet achat avec un réel très bon rapport qualité/prix.
Il cavalletto è arrivato nei tempi previsti e risulta adeguato alle mie necessità per foto eseguite con la fotocamera Nikon D750.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Very compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I like the way it packs down to such a small size as it fits perfectly into my backpack with my other gear its pretty sturdy and feels quite solid when it's up. The legs lock and unlock with a simple cam lever so it gets put up and down with minimal effort. I can take my camera off without having to unscrew it from the tripod as it has a quick release plate on it all in all a very good product well worth what I paid for it

reviews.reviewTitle: Realmente práctico y de buena calidad
reviews.reviewText: He de decir que estoy verdaderamente contento con la compra, pro las siguientes razones.Pros: 😊✔️ Los materiales de los cuales está fabricado son de muy buena calidad. Es robusto y tiene un cierto peso para que pueda estabilizarse mejor.✔️ Se puede colocar básicamente cualquier tipo de cámara. Incluso un móvil o un telescopio.✔️ Dispone de un pequeño gancho en la parte inferior del cuerpo por si queremos colgar algo o añadirle más peso por si hiciese un viento extremo.✔️ Los pies son de goma lo que hace que no pueda arrastrarse y así se queda completamente inmóvil.✔️ Tiene un mango que la verdad que es muy útil a la hora de transportarlo.✔️ Dispone de tres alturas más a la propia longitud del producto. Cerrado mide 50 cm y abierto 140 cm.✔️ También tiene un pequeño medidor de balance con una burbuja para saber si está torcido o no.✔️ Es realmente estable a la hora de tomar fotografías o utilizar un telescopio ya que no se mueve absolutamente nada.✔️ Como cualquier trípode, viene con un mango para poder ir moviendo la cámara. Éste es rígido para evitar que la imagen se nos vaya.✔️ Las patas son muy fáciles de estirar con unas pequeñas lengüetas para fijarlas.✔️ Viene en una bolsa negra para poder transportarlo y evitar rozaduras cuando lo llevemos por ahí.Contras: 🤔❌ La única pega que le vería, sin ser para nada determinante, es que la cremallera de la bolsa no la rodea por completo y no sale con tanta facilidad el trípode. Pero la verdad que es mínima.Conclusión: 😁Si lo que estás buscando es un trípode para grabar, sacar fotos o mirar por un telescopio, este es una buenísima opción. Su precio es más que razonable por la calidad del producto por lo que lo recomiendo al 100%. Yo estoy muy contento con la compra.╔══════════════════════╗║ Espero haber sido de ayuda ✌️ ║╚══════════════════════╝ Trípode para Cámara - CAMBOFOTO 140cm Trípode Compacto y Ligero con 3 Vías de Cabeza Giratoria y Placa de Liberación Rápida para DSLR Canon Nikon y Teléfono Inteligente
Works exceptionally well for me as an amateur!
